title: Massive FPS drop after a moment in the game
body:
Hello Riot,
since the last patch I‘ve been experiencing huge FPS drops. The game starts smoothly with constant 60 fps but in about a minute, the FPS number drops to 10-15 a doesn´t get to previous "level". After restarting the game, the fps gets back to 60 but then again drops after a while. Before I‘ve never experienced any fps problems like this in the game. Tried to clear my registry, reinstall my drivers etc. Nothing helped. 
Thanks in advance.

replies.body: Reinstalling drivers are a good step, but there could be bad game files as well that's struggling to render the match properly.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and see if a force repatch might help, or client repair.  The steps in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide can also help rule out other possibilities.  Test it in a custom game and let me know if it helps!
Unfortunately, nothing has changed. A minute and 20 sec in game and what is stated above has happened again.

Ugh, bummer.  :(  In that case grab the logs provided by the HRT, and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can take a deeper look into this with you and find some options.
